      Sports news from Kaluga and Kaluz province

      Faster, more powerful, following the ravishment of the Olympics, the Kaluz athletes take new plans, overcome insurmountable obstacles and challenge human deficiency! And if we're unlucky with football, and the hockey section didn't open, but the bikers took silver, and we're the best in the world! Kaluga lives without a stadium, no cycling, no widely refrigerated race trail, no superhaggressive boxing and judo sections, but we can do vycbording together with the mutineers of the Yachen Reservoir! Very soon, we are promised to build a super modern sports centre with hotels, shops and conference rooms. And maybe they'll run a new pool and a couple of rolls. The old sports school buildings are finally renovated, and every courtyard will have a sports site with tourists and trainers. More about the victories and losers, as well as the projects of officials and the dreams of healthy life supporters in Caluga, read in section "Sport"!
